author: redbeardlegoman
title: Thoughtless Throwaway Thingamajig
review:
The Buggy is a lazy filler.  There must have been countless other studio paraphernalia that would have been better chosen to add to these promotional sets.  Even a regular old hand-truck would have been better.  While being included in a larger accessories pack may have helped this sad little whatever it is, it would still have been the weakest part of said pack.  This could have easily been passed off as a soap-box racer for a City set, which, in context, would have made it a whole lot better.

Pros

  • You may have gotten it for free.  (Kind of a half-pro, really.)

Cons

  • It's ugly.
  • It's not something that grabs your attention as being part of a movie set.  
  • As with the rest of the polybags in this series, it would have benefited from being part of a larger accessories pack... maybe.

This is a disappointing set that I only bought to satisfy my completist tendencies.  But it's hard even for one like me to like.
